text: The Simple Life is the name of a reality television series originally broadcast on Fox from 2003 to 2005 and on E! from 2006 to 2007. The series stars Paris Hilton and Nicole Richie doing ordinary jobs. == Other websites == * FOX - The Simple Life official website Category:2003 American television series debuts Category:2007 American television series endings Category:2000s American television series Category:American reality television series Category:Fox television series Category:English-language television programs
title: The Simple Life
